name: Lucinde - Recycled Cowl Freeform Top
description:
100% cotton knit. 
Patchwork sleeves band. 
Freeform collar and trim ruffles.
Size Small.

Measurements taken flat in centimeters and inches.

Shoulder to shoulder: 15 in.
Bust, underarm to underarm: 13 in.
Bottom Width: 14 in.
Length, shoulder to hem: 21 1/2 in.

Sleeves, shoulder to hem: 22 in.
Sleeves, width: 6 to 5 1/2 in.

Collar: 4 in.

Care: Wash cold water. Line dry.

name: Arsenie - Recycled Top
description:
100% cotton recycled knit. 
Princess sleeves.
Black stretchy lace on sleeves and bottom.
Closes with ribbons.

Measurements taken flat in centimeters and inches.

Shoulder to shoulder: 16 in - 40 cm
Bust, underarm to underarm: 20 in - 51 cm
Length, shoulder to hem: 22 in - 56 cm

Sleeves, shoulder to hem: 30 1/2 in - 77 cm
Sleeves, width: 8 to 3 1/2 in - 20 to 9 cm

Collar: 4 1/2 in - 11 cm

Care: Wash cold water. Line dry.

name: Cleophe - Recycled Dress
description:
Medium weight suede knit 100% cotton.
sleeves, tie and inserts 100% silk.
Very long sleeves with elastic at the wrist.
Princess sleeves.

Measurements taken flat in centimeters and inches.

Shoulder to shoulder: 18 in - 46 cm
Bust, underarm to underarm: 18 in - 46 cm
Length, shoulder to hem: 28 in - 71 cm
Bottom width: 30 in - 79 cm

Sleeves, shoulder to hem: 31 in - 79 cm
Sleeves width: 7 to 8 in - 19 to 21 cm. 


Care: Wash by hand, cold water. Line dry.

name: Euphrasie - Recycled Corset Top
description:
Made of velvet and stripe jersey. 
Lacing in the back made of crocheted bamboo yarn.
Ribbon pure silk.
Purple lace.

Measurements taken flat in centimeters and inches.

Bust: 16 in - 41 cm
Length front: 26 in - 66 cm
Length back: 28 iin - 71 cm
Bottom width: 17.5 in - 45 cm
Turtle neck: 8 x 3.5 in - 20 x 9 in

name: Paulonie - Recycled Princess Sleeves Top
description:
Body black velvet with blue scroll. 
Princess sleeves 100% cotton.
Bottom poly/viscose mix and lace.
Cameo on front with ruffle, embroidered beads and metal stars.

Measurements taken flat in centimeters and inches.

Bust: 17 in - 43 cm
Length: 25 in - 64 cm
Bottom width: 23 in - 59 cm

Sleeves:
Length: 10 in - 25 cm
Width: 8.5 in - 21 cm
